user.title: Configure AI Entity Renamer
user.description: Set up the AI Entity Renamer integration with your OpenAI API key.

error.invalid_api_key: Invalid OpenAI API key. Please check that your API key is correct and active.
error.permission_denied: Access denied. Your OpenAI API key may not have the required permissions or your account may have restrictions.
error.openai_not_installed: OpenAI Python package is not installed. Please install the openai package.
error.rate_limit_exceeded: OpenAI API rate limit exceeded. Please wait a moment and try again.
error.connection_error: Unable to connect to OpenAI API. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.timeout_error: OpenAI API request timed out. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.bad_request_error: Invalid request sent to OpenAI API. This may be a configuration issue.
error.openai_server_error: OpenAI API is currently experiencing issues. Please try again later.
error.unprocessable_entity: OpenAI API could not process the request. Please check your API key format.
error.unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred while validating the API key. Please try again or check the logs for details.

abort.already_configured: AI Entity Renamer is already configured

init.title: AI Entity Renamer Options
